General.Name: Manitex Capital Inc
General.Description: Manitex Capital Inc. focuses on acquiring interests in life sciences, cleantech, and sustainable products/technologies companies. It also holds a portfolio of marketable securities. The company is headquartered in Kirkland, Canada.
